attributes.review: THIS APP IS HORRENDUS!!!!!!!!!! Too many glitches and the notifications are useless and I already deleted the app. It’s awful. Follow my tik tok though I’m almost at 52k @sofdidomenico
attributes.title: Trump=Dump

attributes.review: Honestly downloaded this just to see what was on it. Was so horrified. Not only is this app stupid, but to anyone with brains makes it obvious that he’s a dumbass who clearly only cares about himself. If he was a good president he wouldn’t have to market himself off in this way. Can’t believe this app was created with blatant disregard to anyone not white or male. This is ridiculous. I downloaded the app and my cat vomited all over the floor. She’s barely freaking sentient and is smarter than anyone who downloaded this app to support trump.
attributes.title: Do NOT download!!!

attributes.review: I was walking mu caterpillar one day when this app came 100mph in a semi truck and brutally ran over my caterpillar and u know who was with this app driving the cheeto himself with him and his dusty crusty musty yellow hair i will never forgive them for this. R.I.P my caterpillar 2020/2020 🐛 he will never be forgotten😭😢😭😢😭😢😭
attributes.title: Killed My Caterpillar. (Very Sad)

attributes.review: Listen I downloaded this app to get what I THOUGHT was the real honest truth about this great nation but let me tell you right now that is not what I received. This app GLITCHES the second I opened it!!! My entire phone froze, the phone got really hot (?!) and then it just shut down?? like it DIED!! I’m writing on this on my 2nd gen Amazon KINDLE!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!! 1 STAR!!!!!!!
attributes.title: MAGA_Ashley_KAG 🇺🇸

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to support my beloved leader Donald Trump and I was horrified at what I discovered. First it asked for my phone number and I barely got the know the app next. Not to mention that it kept giving me instructions. This is a free country America, why are you telling me what to do. Next I noticed all the colors in the background and this was insensitive for the color-blind community who wouldn’t even be able to see. I was appalled to see how dark the cover screen was. I wasn’t able to see what time it was or see my battery percentage. This is very important because I almost missed my daily yoga class. Once I entered my phone number this random guy kept calling and replaying me. I finally got annoyed enough to answer and he started singing to me. I’m not sure entirely what he said but I’ll try to write to the best of my ability what it was. He sang Shawty's like a melody in my head
That I can't keep out
Got me singin' like
Na na na na everyday
It's like my ipod stuck on replay, replay-ay-ay-ay
Shawty's like a melody in my head
That I can't keep out
Got me singin' like
Na na na na everyday
It's like my ipod stuck on replay, replay-ay-ay-ay
Remember the first time we met
You was at the mall with your friends
I was scared to approach ya
But then you came closer
Hopin' you would give me a chance
Who would have ever knew
That we would ever be more than friends
We're real worldwide, breakin all the rules
She like a song played again and again
That girl, like somethin off a poster
That girl, is a dime they say
That girl, is a gun to my holster
She's runnin through my mind all day, ay

Girl you really change my life

I'm in the kitchen cookin things she likes
We're real worldwide, breakin all the rules
Someday I wanna make you my wife
That girl, like somethin off a poster

She's runnin through my mind all day, ay
Shawty's like a melody in my head

It's like my ipod stuck on replay, replay-ay-ay-ay

I can be your melody
A girl that could write you a symphony
The one that could fill your fantasies
So come baby girl let's sing with me
Ay, I can be your melody
A girl that could write you a symphony

Ay, na na na na na na na
